text: Jim Lightcap is a pioneering American gasser drag racer.Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars (Cartech, 2003), pp.181-. Driving a GMC-powered Model A, he won NHRA's C/SR (C/Street; gas) national title at Detroit Dragway in 1960. His winning pass was 15.03 seconds at .Davis, p.182. The next year, he won a second NHRA C/Street national title, at Indianapolis. His winning pass there was 13.63 seconds at .Davis, p.182. ==References== ==Sources== *Davis, Larry. Gasser Wars. North Branch, MN: Cartech, 2003, pp. 181–2. Category:Dragster drivers Category:American racing drivers
